title: Slab typeface
content: I was wondering if anyone could recommend a slab type typeface similar to Achen BT. I like this face but wanted to know if there was something a little more unique but had some of the same quallities. Thanks in advance. FYI, this would be used in a magazine hopefull suitable for the cover.
author: charmagad

comments.content: Giza by Font Bureau might be good

I may recommend marvellous ’ [Farao](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032001/http:/www.stormtype.com/farao.html)’, by František Štorm, again, and again.. :)  
_( My personal fav, when it comes to slab serif.. :) Or ’ [Morgan ( Avec )](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032001/http:/www.secretonix.pt/ftf/catalogue/FTFmorganAvec.htm)’, by Mário Feliciano, as an alternate.? Or ’ [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032001/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Dispatch)’, by Cyrus Highsmith / Font Bureau, as well.? )_
